    Method parameters in PartitionAlgorithm.implementation with type arguments of type Core
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    BF.taskToCore(Vector<Core> cores, TaskSet taskSet)
    Assigns tasks from the given taskSet to the provided list of cores using a Best-Fit strategy.
    void
    BFD.taskToCore(Vector<Core> cores, TaskSet taskSet)
    Assigns tasks from the given taskSet to the provided list of cores using the Best\-Fit Decreasing strategy.
    void
    FF.taskToCore(Vector<Core> cores, TaskSet taskSet)
    Assigns tasks from the given taskSet to the provided list of cores using the First-Fit strategy.
    void
    FFD.taskToCore(Vector<Core> cores, TaskSet taskSet)
    Partition and assign tasks from taskSet to the provided cores using the First-Fit Decreasing strategy.
    void
    None.taskToCore(Vector<Core> cores, TaskSet taskSet)
    Assigns tasks from taskSet to cores according to the "None" strategy.
    void
    SBP.taskToCore(Vector<Core> cores, TaskSet taskSet)
    Partition tasks in taskSet to the provided cores using the similarity-based strategy.
    void
    WF.taskToCore(Vector<Core> cores, TaskSet taskSet)
    Assigns tasks from taskSet to the provided cores using the Worst-Fit strategy.
    void
    WFD.taskToCore(Vector<Core> cores, TaskSet taskSet)
    Partition and assign tasks from taskSet to the provided cores using the Worst-Fit Decreasing strategy.

    Core.setContextSwitchCost(Core requestCore, Job requestJob)
    Inserts a context switch cost for the given request job if the simulator configures a non-zero context switch time; otherwise directly switches the working job.
    void
    Core.setMigrationCost(Core requestCore, Job requestJob)
    Inserts migration (and preceding context switch) costs for a migrating job.
    void
    Scheduler.setParentCore(Core c)
    Associates this scheduler with a core as a local (or single-core) scheduler instance.
